articles.author: Nathan King
articles.title: In His Own Words: Pearl on Auburn's swift exit in SEC Tournament - 247Sports
articles.description: TAMPA, Florida — Only six made shots in the first half proved too poor an offensive performance to overcome, as top-seeded Auburn was bounced from the SEC tournament in its first game, a 67-72 loss to Texas A&M.
articles.content: "Congratulations to Texas A&M. I hope for Texas A&M and for our conference that that's enough to get them in the tournament. They just beat one of the best teams in the country and beat us fr… [+6858 chars]

articles.title: Veteran Kicker Greg Zuerlein Released By Cowboys - DallasCowboys.com
articles.description: The Cowboys have released kicker Greg Zuerlein as they continue to create salary cap space prior to next Wednesday’s start to free agency and the new league year.
articles.content:
FRISCO, Texas  The Cowboys have released kicker Greg Zuerlein as they continue to create salary cap space prior to next Wednesday's start to free agency and the new league year.
